Choose two. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Target permanent you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
• Whenever target creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw two cards.
• Put target face up card you own in exile into your hand.
• Cleanse target permanent. [i](Remove any number and/ or kind of counters from the target.)[/i]
